productname: 50MM X 100 Redwood Planed Square Edge 5Th Finished Size 44MM X 94MM
productdescription: MetsÃ¤ Woods quality softwood PSE (Planed Square Edge) timber is manufactured from slow-grown premium redwood timber, which is precision finished and fully machined.? Planed timber, is perfect for non-structural interior construction projects such as boxing in pipework, batoning or framing, making shabby chic furniture or even storage boxes and planters The square planed edge gives an easy way to complete your project with a neat and tidy finish. productname: Super Lap Fence Panel Pressure Treated 6ft x 4ft (1.83m x 1.22m)
productdescription:
This 4ft overlap fence panel is ideal for use in your garden to create privacy and security along boundaries. An alternative to traditional overlap panels that have 'waney-edged' boards, this version features straight-cut boards that give it cleaner, more contemporary lines. Its natural timber colour will blend attractively into any garden.
It is strengthened with the use of 5 vertical battens on each side. The 44mm frame adds additional strength and rigidity. 
This panel further benefits from having been pressure treated, giving it a 15 year Anti-Rot guarantee.  The panels can also be used without gravel boards. Made in the UK.

productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

productname: Buildgo MOT Type 1 Sub Base Bulk Bag
productdescription: MOT Type 1 has crushed gravel stones that form the sublayer for road surfaces and pathways.  Hardwearing, this gravel provides a load bearing stable layer and a flat surface prior to a top coating of asphalt, concrete, shingle or block paving. The fine mixture also ensures minimal voids in the sublayer when compacted.

productname: Buildgo Gravel and Shingle Bulk Bag 20mm
productdescription: This bulk bag of 20mm construction aggregate consists of gravel and shingle that is ideal for mixing with other products when concreting and floor screeding. This can also be used for landscaping and backfilling drains.

productname: Buildgo Grit/Sharp Sand Bulk Bag
productdescription: This high-strength bulk bag provides fine sharp aggregates used to make ready-mix concrete for multiple applications, such as paving, concreting and constructing floor screeds.

productname: Buildgo Gravel and Shingle Bulk Bag 10mm
productdescription: This bulk bag of 10mm gravel and shingle consists of small stones that are ideal for mixing with other products when concreting and floor screeding. Other uses include backfilling drains and landscaping tasks. It is recommended that the 20mm version or one of the decorative aggregates is used for driveways and paths as the small stones ca n be brought inside on footwear.

productname: Buildgo Sand and Stone Ballast Bulk Bag
productdescription: This ballast bulk bag gives a mixture of sand and stone ballast to be mixed with cement for concreting applications. Also suitable for other building projects such as to provide an even sub-base for driveways, shed bases and more.

productname: Buildgo Building Sand Bulk Bag
productdescription: The builders bulk bag contains building sand of a consistent quality and colour. This essential building aggregate is ideal for use in a variety of applications, including bricklaying mortar.

productname: Buildgo Gravel and Shingle Trade Pack 20mm

productname: Buildgo Building Sand Trade Pack
productdescription: The trade pack contains building sand of a consistent quality and colour. This essential building aggregate is ideal for use in a variety of applications, including bricklaying mortar.

productname: Buildgo Grit/Sharp Sand Trade Pack

productname: Buildgo Sand and Stone Ballast Trade Pack
productdescription: This trade pack provides sand and stone ballast that creates concrete when added to cement. Ideal for concreting and laying screeds, it can also be used to provide an even and strong sub-base prior to laying paving for projects such as driveways and shed bases.

productname: Buildgo MOT Type 1 Sub Base Trade Pack
productdescription: MOT Type 1 has crushed gravel stones that form the granular sublayer for road surfaces and pathways. The fine mixture also ensures minimal voids in the sublayer when compacted.

productname: Buildgo Plastering Sand Bulk Bag

productname: Buildgo Gravel and Shingle Trade Pack 10mm

productdescription: Flexseal Drain Couplings, sometimes referred to as couplers, are simple, easy to use drainage pipe connectors. Drain Couplings are designed to connect two pipes with the same or similar outside diameter.

productname: Flexseal SC120 Standard Coupling 105-120
productdescription: Shear banded couplings are a requirement of the UK water companies when connecting onto their assets. This requirement forms part of Water Industry Specification (WIS) 4-41-01, which outlines the requirements to connect pipes on adopted systems using only shear banded couplings. The shear band gives the connection added protection against shear loads that could cause the pipes to become mis-aligned.

productname: Defender Plastic 8 Bird Spike 337x112mm
productdescription: The Defender¨ 8 Wide Plastic Pigeon Spike is the perfect solution to get rid of pigeons from wide ledges, window sills, beams and other areas of your property. This anti-roosting pigeon spike will protect ledges up to a depth of 20 cm (8 inches) from the heaviest pigeon infestations. All Defender¨ Plastic Pigeon Spikes are easy and quick to install, with no need for professional pest control equipment. As they are made of high quality clear plastic, the pigeon spikes are unobtrusive once in place.

productname: Simpson JHA270/75 Timber to Timber Joist Hanger
productdescription:
JHAs are height-adjustable joist hangers used to support timber joists from timber members. This can be fitted quickly and accurately due to the adjustable height strap, location tab, and speed prongs.

This product is the standard leg (JHA270) version and can be installed directly on the bearing joist or wrapped over the top to achieve higher performance.

JHA is a joist hanger that allows timber joists to be supported from timber members at different heights.

In the long-leg (JHA450) versions, the joist can be installed directly on the face of the carrying joist or it can be wrapped over the top for increased performance.

productname: Simpson Strong-Tie HES10B10 1000mm Heavy Engineered Bent at 100mm
productdescription:
A direct replacement for traditional restraint straps, the innovative design of these lightweight straps allows ease of handling and installation whilst maintaining the structural strength and robustness of much heavier weight types.
The HES (heavy engineered strap) replace the traditional heavy (30 x 5mm) restraint straps in roof and floor construction.
Reduced thickness allows the HES strap to span the bottom chords of trusses and over floor joists without the need for notching.
HES straps are less than 40% of the weight, quicker to fit, and overcome many fixing problems associated with traditional heavy straps.

productname: Sika Wintermix 5LTR
productdescription: Sika Wintermix Admixture is an air entraining, chloride free, liquid admixture for mortar and concrete which also acts as an accelerator for work in sub - zero temperatures, with increased frost resistance during setting. Sika Wintermix improves workability, even in cold weather as well as freeze/thaw resistance in bricklaying mortars, thus eliminating the need for a separate frost proofer. Sika Wintermix can be used as an air entraining, water reducing, admixture and accelerator/frost proofer for brick and block laying mortar, render (internal and external) and concrete Sika Wintermix is also suitable for load bearing brickwork, block laying, external and internal rendering, pointing/repointing brickwork and floor screeds. Due to the embedded metal, Sika Wintermix is non-corrosive to embedded metal and can also replace Lime in the mix, reducing the possibility of lime bloom and efflorescence. Sika Wintermix also benefits from reduced shrinkage, with in turn reduces cracking and crazing.

productname: Blue Circle Ready to Use Postcrete 20kg
productdescription: This Blue Circle ready to use Postcrete is a ready-mix Portland cement with a blend of selected sand, cement and additives formulated for fixing all kinds wooden, concrete and metal posts. It comes in a convenient weatherproof and tear-resistant plastic bag. Easy to use just add to water. Rapid setting (around 5 to 10 minutes), No mixing required

productname: Blue Circle Snowcrete White Cement 25kg
productdescription: Snowcrete is a white cement and is used for architectural uses, providing attractive and durable concrete, rendering and mortar. Uses include cast stone, architectural precast concrete, paving slabs, street furniture and terrazzo. Snowcrete on the UK Mainland is a High Strength CEM I 52,5R. Note to produce a white finish you must also use a white sand and/or aggregate

productname: Blue Circle Hydralime Hydrated Lime 25kg
productdescription: Hydralime may be used with Procem, Mastercrete, General Purpose Cement, Snowcrete and Sulfacrete. Hydralime improves the cohesion, workability, plasticity and long term durability of Mortars and Renders when used. Note that as Hydralime is non-hydraulic, it is not suitable for use in mortars and renders without a Portland cement.

productname: Blue Circle Quality Assured Ready to Use Mortar 20kg
productdescription: Pre-mixed and ready to use with the addition of clean water, M4 (designation III) 1:1:6 cement:hydrated lime:sand mortar. Comprising specially graded sand, lime and admixtures this Blue Circle mortar offers convenience, with no compromise in performance or quality. Weather resistant and durable, this mortar is suitable for most general brick and block applications. Also ideal for pointing or gable ends. The mix is highly workable and cohesive, with a long board life.

productname: Cementone Rapid Set Cement 2.5kg
productdescription: Bostik Rapid Setting Cement is a versatile product that is ideal for a variety of interior and exterior installation, repair, and maintenance projects. It is particularly well-suited for the installation of sanitary fittings, drainage systems, and the upkeep of concrete floors, paths, and steps.

productname: Cementone Rapid Set Cement 5kg

productname: Blue Circle High Strength (40N) Ready to Use Concrete 20kg
productdescription: High Strength Concrete (40N) is a strong, hard-wearing blend of cement, sand and 10mm coarse aggregate. It is suitable for jobs such as concrete bases, drives, paths, footings and foundations, as well as other high strength applications.

productname: SupaGrow Standard Topsoil Bulk Bag 600L
productdescription: SupaGrow multi-purpose blended Top Soil is a high quality, very fertile, peat-free soil. The blend of sand, silt and clay allows for a wide range of planting and landscaping jobs as: Turfing, seeding, planting flower beds, planting vegetables and general garden jobs. It contains a controlled slow release fertilizer, making it an excellent all-rounder nutrient rich soil. The soil contains a unique water retentive material; enabling water to be stored within the fibres of the soil which can then be gradually released to the plants.

productname: SupaGrow Blended Loam Bulk Bag 600L
productdescription: SupaGrow Multi-Purpose Blended Loam consists of clay, sand and silt and is a premium quality peat free soil. SupaGrow blended loam is perfect for any upcoming landscape or gardening projects. Our quality blend is a light weight soil, making it effortless to work in wet conditions. Additionally, it contains a slow release fertilizer ensuring to be an outstanding all-rounder rich soil. Our soil has an organic content of 8% and is analysed to BS3882:2015.

productname: SupaGrow Premium Landscaping Bark Chippings 600L
productdescription:
SupaGrow Landscaping Bark is a natural product which will enhance any 
landscaping project. Available in 600L bulk bags, this dark brown quality grade 
bark can be used not only to lift the appearance of a landscape; but as a mulch 
that helps improve moisture retention, acts as a plant insulator and reduces 
plant loss in the cold weather. Our bark is free of any chemical contamination 
and sized between 8-40mm.

productdescription: SupaGrow Topsoil consists of clay, sand and silt and is a premium quality peat free soil. SupaGrow Topsoilis perfect for any upcoming landscape or gardening projects. productname: ERA Satin Push Button Oval
productdescription:
The ERA Push Button Digital Door Locks is a fully mechanical access control solution designed for low usage application such as store cupboards , staff only areas, IT rooms or office doors. Keyless operation means no keys required and are easy to operate and programme using the keypad. You can choose over 5,000 codes to provide greater security and are suitable for internal and external application. The passage function can be applied, so the door can be opened using just the handle when restricted access is not required.

Suitable for door thickness 35-50mm. The maximum code is 7 digits and the minimum is 1 digit. Available with and without the hold back function.

productname: Ulti-Mate® Stick-Fit® Wood Screws Trade Assortment Qty 1000
productdescription:
These high-performance Ulti-Mate® wood screws are built for strength. Featuring a patented PSD® drive system to enable smooth, stable driving and Stick-Fit® one-handed installation, this trade pack includes 1,000 screws in five sizes from 25-70mm.
A thick core diameter ensures superior strength throughout the body of the screw, and also under the head area. With a sharp point and prominent thread at the tip, you’ll get a rapid start and immediate thread engagement – this saves time and effort, helping you drive more screws per charge if using a cordless tool.
A slotted shank reduces wood splitting, and a countersunk head complete with ribs ensures a flush finish. Screws 40mm and shorter don’t have the ribs, to make them hinge-compatible. As well as five popular sizes, the pack also includes five Stick-Fit® driver bits. A high-quality Stick-Fit driver bit is included in every single box of Ulti-Mate Wood Screws. The screws also feature a type-17 point to drive through the hardest timber, a double-angle countersunk head for a neat finish and a wide, deep single thread for rapid insertion and strong holding power.

productname: ForgeFix Screw Assortment & Case 1500pc
productdescription:

Useful in all trades, including joinery, electrical, and plumbing. Suitable for DIY applications as well. Includes the following, in a convenient organiser case:

productdescription: The Forgefix 5.0 x 100mm multi-purpose woodscrews feature countersunk heads with zinc yellow passivation for extra durability. productname: Deck-Tite Green Deck Screw 50mm Qty 500
productdescription: Deck-Tite's unique thread pitch to core size ratio offers the perfect balance between ease of insertion and pull-out retention whilst increasing the core's sheer strength to match the thread pitch.  It is a tri-lock thread which forms, not cuts, a thread in the material, expanding the wood around the screw, ensuring a tight and secure fix. This thread is formed by forming a thread in the material, not cutting it. There will be no movement of the screw once it has been driven in.

productname: Ulti-Mate Stick-Fit Wood Screws  4.0 x 40mm Qty 1000
productdescription: The Ulti-Mate Wood Screw is a trade-quality, high-performance woodscrew that can be used for fixing hardwood, softwood, man-made timber boards (e.g. MDF, plywood, chipboard & OSB), and sheet metal. 2x high-quality Stick-Fit driver bits are included in every single trade tub of Ulti-Mate Wood Screws. productdescription: A one piece metal fastener with a dish profiled head for mechanically securing drywall and insulated plasterboard panels to walls. productname: Bostik MC250 Vitri-Flex Rapid Set White Wall & Floor Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription:
Bostik MC250 Vitri-Flex is a fast-setting, flexible wall and floor tile adhesive in white. It is suitable for bonding ceramic tiles, quarry tiles, porcelain, vitrified tiles, natural stone and mosaics to wall and floors.

This white, rapid-setting wall and floor tile adhesive is formulated for fast track installation and enables tiles to be grouted in approximately 2 to 3 hours after fixing, depending on conditions. It provides excellent grip and adhesion.

Bostik Vitri-Flex tile adhesive is suitable for most interior and exterior installations including more demanding installations, such as use with underfloor heating and areas subject to limited vibration. When fully cured the adhesive is suitable for permanently wet areas such as showers. It will bond to concrete, plaster, sand/cement render and screeds, blockwork, brickwork, glazed surfaces, vinyl tiles, plywood overlay and more.

One of Bostik's best adhesives for vitrified tiles. Available in a 20kg bag.

productname: Mapei Keraflex Non Rapid White Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Cement based adhesive with fair deformability, good adhesion strength and no vertical slip, ideal for ceramic tiles and stone materials.

productname: Mapei Ultracolor White Water Proof Grout Alupak 5kg
productdescription: Ultracolor Plus grout can be used to enhance wall or floor tiled finishes both internally and externally with many added benefits such as anti-mould and water repellent features as well as being available in a wide range of colours. Suitable for use with almost all types of tile/mosaic. Not for use with metallic tiles or tiles with a soft glaze – if in doubt carry out a small trial area.

productname: Mapeker Rapid Setting Flexible Grey Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Mapeker grey is a rapid setting cement-based adhesive for fixing a wide variety of ceramic, porcelain and mosaic tiles. Recommended also for fixing dark colour stone such as slate and black granite.

productname: Mapeker Rapid Setting Flexible White Tile Adhesive 20kg
productdescription: Mapeker white is a rapid setting cement-based adhesive for fixing a wide variety of ceramic, porcelain and mosaic tiles. Recommended also for fixing light colour stone.

productname: Mapei Ultracolour Grey Water Proof Grout Alupak 113 5kg
productdescription: Ultracolor Plus grout can be used to enhance wall or floor tiled finishes both internally and externally with many added benefits such as anti-mould and water repellent features as well as being available in a wide range of colours. Suitable for use with almost all types of tile/mosaic. Not for use with metallic tiles or tiles with a soft glaze – if in doubt carry out a small trial area.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812633 Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:
Evo-Stick Waterproof Wall Tile Adhesive is a ready-mixed, mould-resistant, waterproof tile adhesive suitable for fixing ceramic wall tiles to most types of sound, and interior surfaces.

As the adhesive is waterproof, it is ideal for use in areas subject to infrequent wetting and condensation, such as kitchen and bathroom walls. This showerproof wall tile adhesive can also be applied directly onto existing tiles for convenience.

Suitable materials: Suitable for fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: For fixing ceramic wall tiles.

Available as a 10L waterproof wall tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the impact of the product on the environment.

productname: Keraflex Maxi White 943296 20kg Versatile Adhesive
productdescription: Keraflex Maxi S1 is a versatile adhesive able to hold large format tiles (e.g. 600 x 600 mm) on walls without slipping. Bed thickness up to 15 mm permits the installation of un-calibrated stone on floors (provided the stone is not sensitive to moisture).

productname: Keraflex Maxi 943297 Grey 20kg Versatile Adhesive
productdescription: Keraflex Maxi S1 is a versatile adhesive able to hold large format tiles (e.g. 600 x 600 mm) on walls without slipping. Bed thickness up to 15 mm permits the installation of un-calibrated stone on floors (provided the stone is not sensitive to moisture).

productname: Evo-Stick 30812629 Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive 10L Natural
productdescription:
Evo-Stick Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive is a fast-acting, ready-mixed tile adhesive for fixing ceramic wall tiles on dry, internal walls. Its showerproof properties make it a suitable wall tile adhesive for areas subject to some splashing and condensation, such as kitchens and bathrooms.

The instant tile adhesive is easy to use and can be used to tile onto most substrates, including existing tiles. 

Suitable materials: For fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders, and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: Ceramic wall tiles

Available as a 10L instant grab tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the product's impact on the environment.

productname: Evo-Stick 30812628 Instant Grab Wall Tile Adhesive 5L Natural
productdescription:

The instant tile adhesive is easy-to-use and can be used to tile onto most substrates, including existing tiles. 

Suitable materials: For fixing onto most internal surfaces including plaster, plasterboard, glazed tiles, brick, cement, cement renders and tile backer boards.

Suitable tiles: Ceramic wall tiles

Available as a 5L instant grab tile adhesive. The adhesive is supplied in a post-consumer recycled (PCR) bucket to reduce the productâ€™s impact on the environment.

productname: Bostik J115 Smooth Finish White Grout 5kg
productdescription:
Bostik J115 Flexible Smooth Finish Grout is a professional quality, cementitious polymer modified grout for walls and floors. It is formulated to provide narrow and wide joints.
This flexible white grout is an easy clean off, non slump formulation and sets in 12 hours to a very hard finish. It is also mould and efflorescence resistant.
Suitable for use with a variety of tile types including ceramic, porcelain, natural stone, mosaic, marble and quarry tiles. It is suitable for joints between 2mm and 15mm for both interior and exterior use.

productname: Grabo Pro-Lifter 20 Cordless Digital Vacuum Lifter with Battery & Charger GRAB300
productdescription:
"The GRABO Pro is our most advanced vacuum lifter, perfect for the safe and easy handling of Tiles, Paving Slabs, Glass, Sheet Metal, Wood, Doors, Sheet Materials, Rough Concrete, Plasterboard, and even Household Appliances and Furniture. Designed with ergonomics in mind, it ensures improved grip and reduced fatigue during the handling of heavy objects.

Equipped with a smart digital pressure sensor, a digital display, and intelligent weight and pressure settings, the GRABO Pro offers enhanced functionality. With the inclusion of an auto on/off switch, the GRABO Pro continuously monitors and maintains the optimal suction level, activating or deactivating as needed. The smart digital gauge provides a visual grip indication, displaying both bar/PSI measurements and the maximum weight that the GRABO Pro can safely lift in kilograms or pounds, ensuring safe and efficient operations.

The Grabo Pro comes fully equipped with a tough zipped carry case, standard seal, battery, and charger"

productname: Grabo Plus Cordless Vacuum Lifter With Battery & Charger GRAB220
productdescription:
The Grabo Plus is the original hand-held, battery-powered vacuum lifter. Using patented technology it revolutionizes the handling of various materials such as tiles, stone, concrete, drywall, plywood, windows, and furniture. The Grabo is versatile, allowing for material handling of glass, sheet metal, windows, doors, hardwood products, timber, beams, plastic sheets, tiles, rough concrete, plasterboard, and even household appliances and furniture.

The Grabo Plus offers immense benefits to individuals involved in lifting and moving heavy objects. Whether it's pavers working with heavy stones, tilers seeking precision placement, or removal companies dealing with awkward furniture, the Grabo allows you to put a handle on almost anything! The original Grabo Plus offers manual controls but matches the 170kg lifting capacity of the Grabo Pro.

The Grabo Plus reduces the risk of strain and injury associated with manual lifting of heavy objects. It allows for a more controlled and ergonomic handling of materials, minimizing the potential for accidents or musculoskeletal issues. By reducing the physical strain on workers and providing a secure grip on materials, the Grabo Plus Tool promotes a safer working environment.

productname: Grabo Slender Foam Seal GRAB107
productdescription:
The GRABO Slender Seal is the perfect accessory for your Grabo, allowing you to lift thinner and longer materials with ease and comfort. The unique design of the GRABO Slender Seal means it’s even easier to grab surfaces with extended, narrow surface areas, such as pavers, long tiles, pipes, cut-to-size bench tops, curb stones, and more.

The Slender Seal is interchangeable with your standard GRABO seal, and swapping between the two is a breeze!

productname: Jsp EVO2 Vented Helmet Yellow
productdescription: The EVO2® Comfort Plus™ helmet combines a super strong shell for superior all day protection in the widest range of environments, with the comfort benefits of the new Evolution® 3D Adjustment™ harness system. EVO2® is a true evolution of the long established MK2® and Mk3® helmets, which were first launched in the 1970’s, the EVO2® retains the JSP signature styling while incorporating developments first seen in the EVO®8. Packed full of the latest protection technology and features such as the Evolution® 3D Adjustment™ harness system, Revolution® Wheel Ratchet or the unique OneTouch™ Slip Ratchet, which can be adjusted using one hand in a single swift movement.

Multi-angled teeth nose probe provides additional bite to prevent sliding and to ensure positive placement of the nail. Ideal for Timber frame erection, truss work, stud work, roof battening, shuttering, decking, close boarding and a host of other applications.

productname: Makita 720W 115mm Slim Angle Grinder Kit GA4530RKD 240V
productdescription: The compact, lightweight 1.8kg design makes it ideal for use on site, Regardless of whether the user grips motor housing or rear cover, the extra-ergonomic barrel grip fits any user’s palm and fingers perfectly, provides easy & comfortable handling while minimizing hand fatigue & pain. Angle grinder with diamond blade and case.

productname: Makita GA9020KD 230mm Angle Grinder with Diamond Blade 110V
productdescription: Labyrinth construction protects all ball bearings from dust and debris, its armature is coated with a protective varnish and field coated with powder varnish to protect the motor from dust and wire breakage. This ensures maximum durability for masonry cutting.

productname: Makita GA9020KD 230mm Angle Grinder with Diamond Blade 240V
productdescription: Labyrinth construction protects all ball bearings from dust and debris, its armature is coated with a protective varnish and field coated with powder varnish to protect the motor from dust and wire breakage. This ensures maximum durability for masonry cutting.

productname: Makita DGA452Z Lxt Angle Grinder Body Only 18V 115mm
productdescription: Body only 115mm Angle Grinder for cutting & grinding applications with the convenience of cordless. Accepts Makita 18V LXT battery. Electronic overload for safety & protection of machine and battery. Soft grip for comfort in use. Comes complete with sde handle.

productname: Grabo Slender Foam Seal GRAB107
productdescription:
The GRABO Slender Seal is the perfect accessory for your Grabo, allowing you to lift thinner and longer materials with ease and comfort. The unique design of the GRABO Slender Seal means it’s even easier to grab surfaces with extended, narrow surface areas, such as pavers, long tiles, pipes, cut-to-size bench tops, curb stones, and more.

The Slender Seal is interchangeable with your standard GRABO seal, and swapping between the two is a breeze!

productname: Grabo Pro-Lifter 20 Cordless Digital Vacuum Lifter with Battery & Charger GRAB300
productdescription:
"The GRABO Pro is our most advanced vacuum lifter, perfect for the safe and easy handling of Tiles, Paving Slabs, Glass, Sheet Metal, Wood, Doors, Sheet Materials, Rough Concrete, Plasterboard, and even Household Appliances and Furniture. Designed with ergonomics in mind, it ensures improved grip and reduced fatigue during the handling of heavy objects.

Equipped with a smart digital pressure sensor, a digital display, and intelligent weight and pressure settings, the GRABO Pro offers enhanced functionality. With the inclusion of an auto on/off switch, the GRABO Pro continuously monitors and maintains the optimal suction level, activating or deactivating as needed. The smart digital gauge provides a visual grip indication, displaying both bar/PSI measurements and the maximum weight that the GRABO Pro can safely lift in kilograms or pounds, ensuring safe and efficient operations.

The Grabo Pro comes fully equipped with a tough zipped carry case, standard seal, battery, and charger"

productname: Grabo Plus Cordless Vacuum Lifter With Battery & Charger GRAB220
productdescription:
The Grabo Plus is the original hand-held, battery-powered vacuum lifter. Using patented technology it revolutionizes the handling of various materials such as tiles, stone, concrete, drywall, plywood, windows, and furniture. The Grabo is versatile, allowing for material handling of glass, sheet metal, windows, doors, hardwood products, timber, beams, plastic sheets, tiles, rough concrete, plasterboard, and even household appliances and furniture.

The Grabo Plus offers immense benefits to individuals involved in lifting and moving heavy objects. Whether it's pavers working with heavy stones, tilers seeking precision placement, or removal companies dealing with awkward furniture, the Grabo allows you to put a handle on almost anything! The original Grabo Plus offers manual controls but matches the 170kg lifting capacity of the Grabo Pro.

The Grabo Plus reduces the risk of strain and injury associated with manual lifting of heavy objects. It allows for a more controlled and ergonomic handling of materials, minimizing the potential for accidents or musculoskeletal issues. By reducing the physical strain on workers and providing a secure grip on materials, the Grabo Plus Tool promotes a safer working environment.

productname: STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift
productdescription: The STANLEY FATMAX TradeLift is a versatile handheld tool for lifting, levelling, holding and spreading of heavy or awkward objects such as appliances, sheet materials or furniture ï¿½ a real life saver when you're working alone. Engineered for safety, this professional, heavy-duty tool enables easy hands-free lifting up to 150kg, to a maximum height of 220mm. The TradeLiftï¿½ is perfect for jobs like hanging doors, installing kitchen cabinets and appliances and fitting windows in all environments, with enclosed metal plate housing to enhance durability and prevent dust entering the tool. The robust lifting tool can be operated by hand or foot, with an ergonomic overmoulded handle providing extra grip, comfort, and control. A fine adjuster lowers the load by up to 2.5mm per toggle for precision levelling and spacing, with a full release button safely recessed to avoid accidental activation. The large base plate with angled edge slides easily under low objects and reduces the risk of tipping, with four screwholes countersunk into the base to anchor the lift for maximum stability.

productname: DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Cordless Jigsaw - Body Only DCS331N-XJ
productdescription: The DeWalt 18V XR Li-ion Jigsaw is part of the intelligent XR lithium-ion platform designed for efficiency and making applications faster. The powerful and highly efficient fan cooled motor with replaceable brushes, delivers up to 3000 strokes per minute, making cutting applications faster. The 3 sided pendulum action feature controls the aggressiveness and smoothness of cuts.

productname: Reisser BMXFITTERPACK Jigsaw Blades Magnetic Bit Holder and 10 Screwdriver Bits Pack
productdescription: Benchmarx Fitters Screw Pack including T101B jigsaw Blades, Magnetic Bit Holder and 10xPZ2 Screwdriver Bits

productname: Evolution MULTI-PURPOSE Compound Mitre Saw 1200W 240V R210cmS
productdescription:
The HTC Evolution R210CMS Multi-Purpose Compound Mitre Saw is safer, faster and more economical than abrasive metal cutting saws. When cutting mild steel the saw produces no heat, no burrs and virtually no sparks. The cuts are clean and cool to touch, creating an instant workable finish.
 
 Utilising patented Evolution multipurpose cutting technology. The R210CMS compound mitre saw is optimised to cut mild steel, non-ferrous metals, wood and wood with embedded nails and plastic with a single blade. No blade changes for hassle free, fast and easy work.
 
 Supplied with: 1 x 210mm x 20 Tooth TCT Multipurpose Blade.

productname: Stanley Junior Sawhorse Twin Pack
productdescription: Sawhorse Twin Pack - maximum load 170kg

productname: V-TUF 240V M Class Mini Dust Extraction Vaccum Cleaner
productdescription: The V-TÜF M CLASS MINI helps you tackle dust at the source. Connect it directly to your power tools or sweep up and enjoy a dust-free environment. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI is M-Class Rated, the ‘Minimum Requirement’ for construction sites. Unrated vacuum cleaners are extremely dangerous as respirable dust can pass through the motor and be pumped back into the air. This dust then remains airborne for up to 8 hours, where it can be inhaled directly into your lung chamber, where it will remain forever. Approximately 700 people in the UK die every year due to illness relating to the inhalation of respirable dust. Needless to say, this dust also damages your vacuum motor. The V-TÜF®M CLASS MINI offers you affordable compliance and protection from common dust-related health issues! The new M CLASS MINI is a keystone that helps V-TUF achieve its mission: To save and improve the lives of those in their line of duty. Ideal for: Construction & woodworking Industries. No reason to not embrace the M Class protection.

productname: DeWalt 2 Way Cross Line Laser Level
productdescription: The DeWalt Cross Line Laser can project bright crossing horizontal and vertical lines to suit various levelling and layout applications. Designed to deliver maximum brightness for increased visibility while working in low light or dark conditions. It has a total working range extending to almost 165ft with indoor visibility of 100ft. Built in magnetic pivot bracket mounts easily on metal surfaces.

Its abrasion resistant polyester film coated blade coating provides up to 10 times more resistance to abrasion than a standard lacquered blade, with additional BladeArmor™ coating, reinforcing the first 7.5cm of the blade, the section most vulnerable to wear. The tape measure features a 32mm blade width and an impressive reach of 4.9 metres The TRU-ZERO™ hook helps to achieve precise inner and outer measurements, moving back and forth along the securing rivets. Highly polished chrome case with rubber grip to ensure slip resistant hold to withstand heavy use on the jobsite. The tape comes with a large, protruding oversized multi-catch hook, significantly larger than a conventional hook and protruding on all edges - shaped to hook onto building materials with ease above, below and to either side. productname: ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife
productdescription: The ToughBuilt® Scraper Utility Knife is an innovative 2-in-1 tool expertly crafted from pro-grade materials. It features a patented mechanism that allows you to transform it from a utility knife to a scraper with a simple press of your thumb. It includes five custom, Universal ToughBuilt Blades that are easily changed with the push of a button, and which are compatible with almost all other utility knives. It does everything a scraper and utility knife does, all in one tool. In scraper-mode you can remove paint, putty, labels and adhesive from windows, mirrors, tile. In knife-mode you can cut carpet, cardboard, plastic, vinyl, rope and more with ease and precision. The rugged, non-slip rubber handle is strong, durable and easy to hold, and the finger-guard ridge helps keep you safe while cutting. It also includes an integrated paint-can opener and a handy lanyard-opening for easy tethering.

productname: FrogTape® For Gloss & Satin 36mm x 41.1m
productdescription: Get crisp, clean lines on your next painting project with FrogTape® for Gloss & Satin Painter’s Tape. How does it work? It’s made with exclusive PaintBlock® Technology, a super-absorbent polymer that reacts with predominantly water and oil based paints and instantly gels to form a micro-barrier that seals the edges of the tape to prevent paint bleed. The result is a crisp, professional paint line.

productname: FrogTape® Delicate Surface 36 mm x 41.1m
productdescription: Get crisp, clean lines on your next painting project with FrogTape® Delicate Surface Painter’s Tape. How does it work? It’s made with exclusive PaintBlock® Technology, a super-absorbent polymer that reacts with the water in emulsion paint and instantly gels to form a micro-barrier that seals the edges of the tape to prevent paint bleed. The result is a crisp, professional paint line. Specifically designed to work on delicate surfaces such as fresh paint, wallpaper and decorative projects, this premium grade masking tape is perfect for when you need a lower adhesion level to help prevent surface damage.

productname: Hippo Carpet Protector 80cm x 50m
productdescription:
This is a transparent, non-porous and low slip carpet protector for safeguarding carpets from damage during periods of decorating, renovation and building work.

Unlike most other types of carpet protector, our special water-based adhesive allows it to be used on all types of carpet, including those made from natural fibers like wool.

No special applicator is required. Instead, rolls are reverse wound which means they can be simply dropped in place and quickly kicked out to unroll.

Hippo High-Performance Carpet Protector is certified fire retardant and meets UK fire regulations. This means that it can be left down in commercial buildings for up to 30 days.

productname: Zinsser PERMA-WHITE Mould Resistant 1L Interior Paint
productdescription:
Perma-White® mould resistant interior paint contains a biocode that protects the dried coating against fungal degradation*. The paint film is designed to resist cracking, peeling and blistering for up to 7 years before first maintenance.

Perma-White® bonds to existing solvent-based or glossy paints. Perma-White® also seals flat paint, new drywall, cement block and concrete. It is ideally suited for any area of persistent high humidity, frequent temperature changes and poor air circulation.

Perma-White® Interior Matt Paint - Recommended for application in high-humidity areas where a durable, low sheen finish is desired such as finished basements and kitchen

productname: JG Speedfit 15mm x 25m Layflat polybutylene pipe coil
productdescription: Speedfit Layflat Polybutylene barrier pipe has even greater flexibility making the system very easy to handle and worry free. Flexibility – The pipe is ideal for long runs where a softer pipe material is an advantage so cabling through joists becomes a simple task. Easier to handle – When removed from the coil, the pipe keeps straight and ‘lays flat’ meaning there are no issues with the pipe retaining its memory and trying to coil back into place. barrier Layer – The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components.

productname: JG Speedfit PEX barrier pipe length 15mm x 3m
productdescription: Speedfit lengths of barrier pipe are rigid making them easy to handle on site. Manufactured in the UK by John Guest Speedfit. The pipe is ideal for short runs where a harder pipe material is an advantage. The pipe is made of 5 layers, the center of which is a blue coloured oxygen barrier which prevents the ingress of air into the system, reducing the effect of corrosion on metal components. Due to its low thermal conductivity, when carrying hot water, Speedfit Pipe is cooler and therefore safer to touch. Note: JG Speedfit pipe inserts must be used.

productname: Hep2O 15mm x 3m Barrier Pipe Length Push-Fit
productdescription: This tamper proof straight barrier pipe from Hep2O comes with a HepKey system for easy demounting, and colour coded packaging for ease of identification. Made from polybutylene material, it offers a robust and ultra flexible installation through joists and beams. Featuring In4Sure joint recognition and SmartSleeve that stays captive in the pipe, this barrier pipe offers a secure and leak-proof alternative to the traditional copper pipes

productname: JG Speedfit 90° Equal Elbow Elbow 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit plastic fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe and twist the plastic nut clockwise to lock in place. Should the need arise to demount the connection unlock the nut and push the collet towards the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. The fitting ensures an easier working environment in confined places and removes the need for hot works on site. Installation can be reduced by around 40% against traditional fixing methods. Note: with all plastic pipes the relevant manufacturer’s pipe insert is required. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.

productname: Hep2O 2 port manifold socket and closed spigot white 22x10mm
productdescription: Hep2O is packed with unique features that make fitting easier quicker and more secure for installers. It is the only system with joint recognition and secure demounting and comes with a 50 year guarantee.

productname: Hep2O HD5/10W 90° Equal Elbow 10mm
productdescription:
10mm 90° Equal Elbow for Hep2O push-fit plumbing. 
Hep2O is not just designed to perform, it’s built to last which is why it comes with a 50 year guarantee (twice as long as anyone else). The slim and sleek push-fit plumbing fittings work with both plastic and copper pipe and are ideal for a range of hot and cold water, and heating applications. Easy to install and with proven performance, Hep2o is the primary solution for central heating systems and hot and cold water services.

productname: Hep2O 90° Equal Elbow 15mm

productname: JG Speedfit stop end 15mm
productdescription: Speedfit push-fit fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe. A must for any tool bag! The unique feature of the Speedfit concept, the ability to disconnect the fitting at will, means the Stop End provides a leak proof seal and can be removed at any stage in order to allow work to restart or allow an extension to the system. This makes the fitting the perfect tool for when water needs to be turned on, overnight for instance, or if a job suffers an interruption. Stop ends are also useful when pressure testing a system before appliances are connected. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe. Should the need arise to demount the connection push the collet toward the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. Designed, manufactured and assembled in the UK by John Guest Speedfit.
